English: Now that we've destroyed the §RTRAITORS§! What shall we do with them?
Now that Germany has reached its logical conclusion, we should look outward
We have successfully conquered all of Scandinavia! Let us teach them that they are GERMAN!
We have successfully conquered all of England! Let us teach them that they are GERMAN!
The Beornians are descendants from Englishmen, thus they are GERMANIC!
We have successfully conquered all of Beornia! Let us teach them that they are GERMAN!
The Batavians are descendants from Dutchmen, thus they are GERMANIC!
We have successfully conquered all of Batavia! Let us teach them that they are GERMAN!
The Caribbean has long since beeen influenced by Germanic cultures, it is just up top us to REMIND THEM!
While the Caribbean is mix of multiple cultures and ethnicities, however, there are a few tht descend from Germanic heritage. Let us accept them into our empire
It's time to save the Balters in Livonia!
Let us finsih what the Teutonic Order started
We have lost our Italian lands due to (checks notes... IDK I didn't read the lore doc) It's time to reclaim our rightful lands!
Now that we have conquered North Italy, we must remind the people there of their past in the Holy Roman Empire
Now that we have conquered Northern Italy, let us march on Rome!
Now that we have conquered the Papal states, we must accept them
Let us claim our spot us the §RROMAN EMPEROR!
By Imperial Decree, all subjects shall be granted citizenship (Except the Africans, Arabs, Iranians, Kurds...)
While we hold the title of 'Danubian confederation', we don't control the entire river. So! Lets us sail down the Danube!
We have conquered the Pannonian Basin, now we must decside what to do with the people within it
Now that we have conquered up to the Pannonian Basin, let ues SAIL TO THE BALCK SEA!
We have conquered the Romanians surrounding the Danube, now what should we do with them?
While we full control over the Danube, we do not possess control over the Adriatic Sea. Let us change that by claiming the Balkans!
